page.title: 06Family life in Fauldhouse
page.content: My mum and dad get up about 6:45am to get ready for my niece coming because her mum and dad go to work. Then my dad lights the fire. My mum wakes me up at 8:00am for school. When I go up to school my mum gets on with the {housework and washing.}After my mum has finished my dad and mum go to my grandmother as she isn't able to go out .If it is a good day my dad takes Jennifer, my niece,a walk to see sheep and lambs. Once she comes back she goes for a sleep. My mum then finishes of the housework.At 2:30pm my mum takes Jennifer home.On the way she goes her{shopping.} When I come home from school my parent's ask me what kind of day I have had at school. When my sister comes in the family have dinner.After that I go out to play, and I sometimes go a run on my bike with my dad up the
